jokes.question: Why did the chicken cross the road?
jokes.answer: To get to the other side.

jokes.question: What do you call a pig that does karate?
Why did the bike fall over?
Why did the golfer bring spare trousers?
jokes.answer: In case he got a hole in one.

jokes.question: Why did Emma give the pony a glass of water?
jokes.answer: Because it was a little horse.

jokes.question: Why did the scarecrow win an award?
jokes.answer: He was outstanding in his field.

jokes.question: What do you call fake spaghetti?
Why do bees have sticky hair?
What do you call a factory that produces adequate products?
How do you organise a space party?
